data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Filmmakers can use a variety of lenses to alter images and create different visual effects for their films. The ____ length ____ a lens ____ often ____ as ____ size. Lenses ____ often ____ as " wide-angle, " " ____, " " telephoto, " ____ given ____ lengths ____ millimeters. A wide-angle ____ has a ____ focal ____ and ____ capture a ____ area ____ the ____ than a ____ or ____ lens. In film, telephoto lenses are used to create extreme close-up views of an object or person in the frame while minimizing the background.

In film, telephoto lenses are used to create extreme close-up views of an object or person in the frame while minimizing the background.
data.answer: 电影人可以使用不同的镜头来改变图像，为他们的电影创造不同的视觉效果。透镜的焦距通常用它的大小来表示。镜头通常被标记为“广角”、“普通”、“长焦”，或者以毫米为单位给出焦距。广角镜头焦距短，可以比普通镜头或长镜头捕捉到更大的图像面积。在电影中，长焦镜头被用来在画面中创造一个物体或人的极端特写视图，同时最小化背景。
